item.title: Victor Borisovich Lidskii (1924-2008)
item.description: arXiv:1008.2669v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: This is the editors' preface to the volume "Operator theory and its applications, in memory of V. B. Lidskii (1924-2008)". The volume was published by the American Mathematical Society in the series AMS Translations, series 2, volume 231 (2010).
item.arxiv:journal_reference: Operator Theory and Its Applications: In Memory of V. B. Lidskii (1924-2008) (ed. M.Levitin and D.Vassiliev), American Mathematical Society Translations - Series 2, vol. 231, American Mathematical Society, 2010, p. 1-5
item.dc:creator: Michael Levitin, Dmitri Vassiliev
